ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Any of a group of colors reddish in hue, of medium to high lightness, and of low to moderate saturation.: Gear consisting of a set of articles or tools for a specified purpose

Concepts.definition: Any of a group of colors reddish in hue, of medium to high lightness, and of low to moderate saturation.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The achromatic color of maximum lightness; the color of objects that reflect nearly all light of all visible wavelengths; the complement or antagonist of black, the other extreme of the neutral gray series.: Gear consisting of a set of articles or tools for a specified purpose

Concepts.definition: The achromatic color of maximum lightness; the color of objects that reflect nearly all light of all visible wavelengths; the complement or antagonist of black, the other extreme of the neutral gray series.
Gear consisting of a set of articles or tools for a specified purpose

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The hue of that portion of the visible spectrum lying between green and indigo, evoked in the human observer by radiant energy with wavelengths of approximately 420 to 490 nanometers; any of a group of colors that may vary in lightness and saturation, whose hue is that of a clear daytime sky.: Gear consisting of a set of articles or tools for a specified purpose

Concepts.definition: The hue of that portion of the visible spectrum lying between green and indigo, evoked in the human observer by radiant energy with wavelengths of approximately 420 to 490 nanometers; any of a group of colors that may vary in lightness and saturation, whose hue is that of a clear daytime sky.
Gear consisting of a set of articles or tools for a specified purpose

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The hue of the long-wave end of the visible spectrum, evoked in the human observer by radiant energy with wavelengths of approximately 630 to 750 nanometers; any of a group of colors that may vary in lightness and saturation and whose hue resembles that of blood: Gear consisting of a set of articles or tools for a specified purpose

Concepts.definition: The hue of the long-wave end of the visible spectrum, evoked in the human observer by radiant energy with wavelengths of approximately 630 to 750 nanometers; any of a group of colors that may vary in lightness and saturation and whose hue resembles that of blood
Gear consisting of a set of articles or tools for a specified purpose

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The hue of that portion of the visible spectrum lying between orange and green, evoked in the human observer by radiant energy with wavelengths of approximately 570 to 590 nanometers; any of a group of colors of a hue resembling that of ripe lemons and varying in lightness and saturation.: Gear consisting of a set of articles or tools for a specified purpose

Concepts.definition: The hue of that portion of the visible spectrum lying between orange and green, evoked in the human observer by radiant energy with wavelengths of approximately 570 to 590 nanometers; any of a group of colors of a hue resembling that of ripe lemons and varying in lightness and saturation.
Gear consisting of a set of articles or tools for a specified purpose

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The hue of that portion of the visible spectrum lying between yellow and blue, evoked in the human observer by radiant energy with wavelengths of approximately 490 to 570 nanometers; any of a group of colors that may vary in lightness and saturation and whose hue is that of the emerald or somewhat less yellow than that of growing grass.: Gear consisting of a set of articles or tools for a specified purpose

Concepts.definition: The hue of that portion of the visible spectrum lying between yellow and blue, evoked in the human observer by radiant energy with wavelengths of approximately 490 to 570 nanometers; any of a group of colors that may vary in lightness and saturation and whose hue is that of the emerald or somewhat less yellow than that of growing grass.
Gear consisting of a set of articles or tools for a specified purpose

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A light bluish-green to light greenish-blue color.: Gear consisting of a set of articles or tools for a specified purpose

Concepts.definition: A light bluish-green to light greenish-blue color.
Gear consisting of a set of articles or tools for a specified purpose
